topic.preview: Pythonic Interface Description Language。Moving to a microservice architecture solves many issues, but it is hard.Pidl, our in-house interface layer, allows to isolate services with only minimal changes in client and service code. A pidl service efficiently exports fully functional python modules, with functions, classes and methods. For the user, it is pure magic: the service is used as a normal python module but its code is never imported!
topic.title: pidl: python-powered microservices at Douban

id_alexdong.intro: 对角巷创始人; 好看簿创始人之一; 微软2004年评出的全球56个架构师MVP中唯一的中国人. 他对历史和艺术有浓厚的兴趣; 相信结构的力量. 在不工作的时候;他喜欢品南方绿茶;听各式音乐;看历史/经济/科幻/技术书籍; 曾经是半职业游泳运动员的他更喜欢绕着玉渊潭跑上15公里;出一身汗; 他还喜欢打篮球;中投自认还不赖.
id_alexdong.name: Alex Dong

topic.title: Effective python functional programming: techniques, tools and practices

id_liang2.intro: 目前就讀台灣大學生醫電資碩士，研究領域為癌症基因調控網路分析。平時經常參與台灣開源社群如 Taipei.py 與 MLDM Monday (Taiwan R User) 活動，於 PyCon APAC 2014、2015 擔任工作人員與講者，同時亦為 PyCon TW 2016 議程組長。去年於北京 Microsoft Asia Research (MSRA) 實習，現於台灣電子商務公司 Pinkoi 實習。 - 個人網站：'http://liang2.tw' - @ccwang002
id_liang2.name: 亮亮

topic.preview: 首先分享在 Pinkoi 實習的經驗，如何使用 jieba 與改善 Elasticsearch 中文商品搜尋體驗，同時分享調整 jieba 斷詞於搜尋使用的一些經驗。再進一步透過 word2vec 自動找出商品間的關係，利用它語意上的特徵，完成一些如相似商品推薦等進階的搜尋功能。剩下的時間將會介紹現階段台灣 Python 社群發展以及宣傳明年活動。
topic.title: 用 jieba 处理中文以及台湾的 Py 社团

sponsors.intro: SegmentFault is China's leading developer community. After more than two years of development, SegmentFault is already have more than ten developer. SegmentFault's goal is to provide Chinese developers to one of the most pure technical exchange platform,  create belong to the age of developers together

Open Source China (OSC) founded in August 2008 is the largest open source community in China; It has more than 2.2 million registered members and Alexa ranking 1400 in the world. OSC provides multiple channles including news/ forum/ code sharing/ blogs/ and translation / etc to help local developers study and utilize open soure technology .

猎聘网（www.liepin.com），隶属于万仕道（北京）管理咨询有限公司，于2011年正式上线，是国内唯一真正实现企业、猎头和职业经理人三方互动的职业发展平台。猎聘网始终专注于打造以经理人个人用户体验为核心的职业发展平台，全面颠覆传统网络招聘以企业为核心的广告发布平台。截至2015年6月，猎聘网拥有超过2000万的注册会员，已服务超过39万家优质企业。目前，有超过20万名猎头在猎聘网平台上寻找核心岗位的候选人。猎聘网的业务遍及中国北京、上海、广州、深圳、天津、大连、杭州、南京、武汉、厦门、成都、青岛、重庆、郑州等十余个城市。

CloudSmart (Beijing)  technology co., LTD founded in 2009 ,that is a leading domestic application performance management service providers. Based on big data analysis, for enterprise users to provide the solution of End To End Application Performance Management comprehensive. For electronic commerce, mobile Internet, cloud IaaS service, online game, education and  the medical industry users provided a forward-looking & wisdom application performance management

Shanghai Steel Trading Centre (SHGT.com) is a B2B steel e-business platform invested by Baosteel Group in 2013. As a leading company, we provide one-stop service including consulting, transaction, finance, metallic processing, logistics and so forth. During the past year, we created more than 85,000 registered platform memberships. The annual business volume online is over 10.6 million tons; revenue is around 5 billion USD.With our Intelligent Platform, you will have Simpler Business. OUYEEL!

Founded in 2004, Facebook’s mission is to give people the power to share and make the world more open and connected. People use Facebook to stay connected with friends and family, to discover what’s going on in the world, and to share and express what matters to them.

SpeedyCloud is the IaaS brand owned by Beijing SpeedyCloud Technology Co., Ltd.,, who is one of the leaders in cloud industry.The company was setup in 2012, with the capital of 10 million RMB invested all by ourselves.Being the general solution provider,  our focus is to provide IaaS for Internet and enterprises companies. Most of the team came from public IT operating and service companies like ChinaCache, 21ViaNet, etc. We are helping our customers with the most cutting-edge cloud computing technologies to expand their online businesses.

qiniu cloud storage by domestic industry one of the leading Xu Shiwei was founded in 2011, Committed to providing the most suitable for developers of online hosting, transmission speed, and the cloud data processing services.

Douban.com launched on March 6, 2005, is a Chinese SNS website allowing registered users to record information and create content related to film, books, music, and recent events and activities in Chinese cities.

Aliyun, the cloud computing business of Alibaba Group Holding Limited was established in September 2009. It develops highly scalable platforms for cloud computing and data management and provides a comprehensive suite of cloud computing services to support the participants of Alibaba Group's online and mobile commerce ecosystem, including sellers, and other third-party customers and businesses.

Coding is a cloud development platform for developers, Provide code hosting, space operation, quality control, project management, etc., Coding provide social collaboration capabilities, including the SNS to provide developers with technical discussion and collaboration platform.
HZ Book is a joint venture set up with China Machine Press and (US)WanGuo.

Ganguo Mobile is the most well-known development team in Pearl River Delta. With years of experience in mobile application and web development; our specialists offer cost-effective mobile solution and maintenance program. The integration of our experience; creativity and vision has helped us to deliver concrete product with great satisfaction to our clients.  Our main business are mobile app development (iOS / Android); development and implementation of Wechat services account; big data analysis and other mobile related territory. We have been working with leading brands in information technology/ automobile/ consumer product/ real estate/ Internet/ finance/ and entertainment business.

Turing Co., Ltd  persists in planning publishing high quality books of science and technology as the core business, launched a series of high quality best-selling technology books, it's one of China famous and influential computer books publisher and Professional technical & Reading community. Set up nine years, accumulative total sold more than 500 copies of books and have impress millions of readers. Turing Co., Ltd that provide first-class content is its responsibility. Rapid growth in recent years has been for domestic famous ebook sales platform of science and technology.

Tupu Technology Co.,Ltd. is a venture company which is at the forefront of artificial intelligence industry, and it gathered excellent members from both outstanding technology companies and universities in China. Tupu Technology made cooperation with a remarkable national laboratory from the very beginning and keep devote themselves into the field of computer vision, and that’s why they have achieved several pioneered techniques and widely recognition in the industry.Tupu company can provide intelligent censorship, image-search engine, image classification and custom-made services. What’s more, based on deep learning algorithm, it has built the first open platform for image recognition in China.

叮当Dingdone是一款移动应用自助生产运营平台，主要支持大众用户通过“叮当”来DIY开发APP，仅需分分钟，即可一键打包并同时生成适配于iOS、Android系统的Native原生应用程序和H5网页。与市场上基于HTML5打包的Web APP制作工具不同，依托于云技术的叮当提出了原生应用仓库的概念，通过丰富的风格、列表、功能模板以及强大且细粒度的属性参数，支撑APP的表现定义和样式变化。同时，它还能够为开发者提供H5 SDK和API，让用户可以嵌入不同数据和内容，十分便捷。“叮当”有别于简单粗暴的复制模式，已具备相当完善的设备功能和交互体验，用户可最大化发挥自定义空间，在云平台上创建、管理及生成一款别具一格的原生应用程序。利用“叮当”，即使是不懂编程和设计知识的普通人也能够信手拈来， APP制作者只需要通过“搭积木”的方式即可完成跨平台原生应用开发。

广州齐昌网络科技有限公司,专注于技术咨询和开发外包业务,承接基于Web技术的开发业务外包,包括基于浏览器/服务器模式的应用软件,电子商务和电子政务系统研发,承接基于iOS,Android的软件开发业务外包,承接基于 Linux的系统软件开发外包. 齐昌网络由赖勇浩于2014年底创办,赖勇浩也是多届的PyCon分享讲师,在Python相关技术上有深入研究,除技术博客有近250万浏览量外还合著有<<编写高质量代码:改善Python程序的91个建议>>一书.
易开发，是一家为开发者提供企业应用快速开发平台的公司。目前专注于微信企业号的快速（无码）定制开发方案。在当前互联网+浪潮中，我们帮助企业多快好省地迈向互联网化和信息化。我们在丰厚企业信息化基础设施之上，提供了创新的、人性化开发工具，极大地降低开发者门槛，提升开发效率，降低了项目开发和维护成本。

D.G.Z was founded by Thomas Yao at the end of 2012 in Shanghai, China. Our mission is to improve the Information Technology education ecosystem around the world.We are building two bridges to connect people, one is from college and middle school students to real world projects, the other one is from China to western countries and vice versa.

volunteers.intro: 永泰红磡养老产业投资集团的信息技术总监;在14年的互联网生涯后,投身到到永泰红磡养老产业投资集团做夕阳事业,跨界发展. 他是TopGeek技术社区的创办人也是上海GDG的负责人,并参与CPyUG社区的管理. 还发起PMCamp产品经理社区,儿童社区乐创园等
volunteers.name: StingChen(陈世欣)

volunteers.intro: One of originator for CPyUG(China Python User Group) / administrator; Enthusiastic python community welfare, well-known community "DAMA"; OBP and PythoniCamp project designer / manager; attend and originator all kinds of  online / offline tech evnets, presided compiled "lovely Python"; keeping usage Pythonic to reclaim people entering the FLOSS world learning / sharing / innovate! currently work for CMCM.
volunteers.name: Zoom.Quiet (大妈)
